description: Looking for new salads to add to your repertoire? This tasty recipe with chicken, snow peas, sugar snap peas, garden peas and rocket won't disappoint.
name: Chicken & Three Pea Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add peas to bowl with rocket and toss with half the yoghurt dressing to combine. Slice chicken and serve with salad, toasted sourdough and remaining dressing drizzled over the top.
